comment: Beauty of Paris lies in this monument. What a beautiful creations by the architects and engineers.
The most spectacular and wonderful place in Paris. The Eiffel tower is historical place, but looks modern at the same time.
Absolutely loved it. The sight from the top is worth the climb. It was truly one of the highlights of my visit to Paris. One of my favourite places I’ve ever visited.
Beautiful site to see. Everyone knows this tower, and it’s a staple of the Parisian skyline.
